text.title: Kuwaiti court sentences seven to death for June mosque bombing
text.head: Kuwaiti court sentences seven to death for June mosque bombing

list.item: Hussain al-Qatari. "7 sentenced to death over IS bomb at Kuwait mosque" — The Scotsman , September 16, 2015
